files.patch:
@@ -73,5 +73,5 @@
-        if test -s "/opt/freeware/include/cups/cups.h"; then
-          CUPS_CFLAGS="-I/opt/freeware/include"
-          CUPS_FOUND=yes
-          AC_MSG_RESULT([$CUPS_FOUND])
-        fi
+        AC_CHECK_HEADERS([/opt/freeware/include/cups/cups.h /opt/freeware/include/cups/ppd.h], [
+            CUPS_FOUND=yes
+            CUPS_CFLAGS="-I/opt/freeware/include"
+            DEFAULT_CUPS=yes
+        ])
